data.text: Hena ne oyi a ofi Edom reba,
Adɛn nti na mo ntade bere kɔɔ,
Na aweretɔda wɔ me koma mu
Mehwɛe, nanso na ɔboafo biara nni hɔ,
Mitiatiaa amanaman no so wɔ mʼabufuw mu;
Ɔkae se, “Ampa ara wɔyɛ me nkurɔfo,
Wɔn amanehunu nyinaa mu, ɔno nso huu amane,
Afei ne nkurɔfo kae tete nna no,
nea ɔsomaa nʼanuonyam basa a ɛwɔ tumi
nea odii wɔn anim faa bun mu
te sɛ anantwi a wɔkɔ sare so,
Nanso wo ara wo ne yɛn Agya
Adɛn, Awurade, na woma yɛkwati wʼakwan
Bere tiaa bi mu wo nkurɔfo faa wo kronkronbea
Enti yɛyɛ wo de fi tete,
